document_data.caption: A map of the Pirate Isles showing the Spoon in the east.
document_data.name: Spoon
document_data.region: The [[Pirate Isles]], the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]]
document_data.mainbody:
{{otheruses4|the strait|the eating utensil|spoon}}
'''The Spoon''' was a small strait found within the [[Pirate  Isles]] on the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].
document_data.Geography: The Spoon was situated in the east and northeast region of the Pirate Isles. It ran along the southern edge of [[Alphar Isle]] and the eastern shore of [[Ilthan]] and bordering [[the Bowl]] to the south.
document_data.Description: The Spoon was was a narrow strait, especially when compared with the nearby [[Windrace]]. The sharp twists needed to safely navigate its waters usually meant the Spoon was not the first course choice for sailors in the area.
